definition: ten thousand strings of cash/very wealthy/millionaire
to pierce through/to pass through/to be stringed together/string of 1000 cash
lit. ten thousand strings of cash in money belt (idiom); carrying lots of money/extremely wealthy/loaded

sentences.english: This guy makes more money than god and you have the outright audacity to ignore what he has to say.
sentences.chinese: 他家財萬貫，而且你絕對有膽量忽略他所說的。

sentences.english: Don't go for wealth ; even that fades away.
sentences.chinese: 不要追求萬貫家產，財富最終也會化爲烏有。

sentences.english: Don't go for wealth even that fades away.
sentences.chinese: 不要追求萬貫家產，財富也會散盡。

sentences.english: He went away a beggar, returned a millionaire.
sentences.chinese: 他討喫要飯離家，腰纏萬貫迴歸。

sentences.english: Isolated by his wealth, ethical high-mindedness and fierce critical intelligence, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 家財萬貫，出身高貴，和一個極富批判精神的頭腦。

sentences.english: Do not go for wealth ; even that fades away.
sentences.chinese: 不要追求萬貫家財，財產也會散盡。

sentences.english: Old Mr. Wilson is lousy with money. He must have possessed some sort of alchemy.
sentences.chinese: 韋爾遜老先生尹腰纏萬貫，他準是掌握了什麼點金術。

sentences.english: It is ludicrous to imagine that foreigners are just easy marks with fat purses.
sentences.chinese: 只把外國人看成腰纏萬貫的簡單形象是荒謬的。

sentences.english: His son diced himself out of a large fortune.
sentences.chinese: 他兒子擲骰子賭輸了萬貫家財。

sentences.english: And if you believe you’ll never be rich, guess what?
sentences.chinese: 如果你認爲你永遠不會變得腰纏萬貫，你猜怎麼着？

sentences.english: Her exceptional musical talent took he from rags to riches.
sentences.chinese: 她傑出的音樂才能使她從一貧如洗到家財萬貫。
